title: 刀剑神域UI 问题。求大神来帮忙翻译一下。
author: s915039544
txt_content:
# Configuration file
general {
    B:debug=false
    S:friend.request.text=%s wants to add you as friend.
    S:friend.request.title=Friend Request
    S:message.from=from %s
    S:message.title=Message
    B:option.client_chat_packets=true
    B:option.cross_hair=true
    B:option.default_inventory=true
    B:option.default_ui=true
    B:option.health_bars=true
    B:option.logout=true
    B:option.particles=true
    B:option.smooth_health=true
    S:party.dissolving.text=You will disband your party?
    S:party.dissolving.title=Dissolve
    S:party.invitation.text=%s invites you to join a party.
    S:party.invitation.title=Invite
    S:party.leaving.text=You will leave your party?
    S:party.leaving.title=Leave
}


还有不知道为什么设置完保存之后他会重置配置文件。。

replies.author: ZGLHHH
replies.txt_content:
s915039544 发表于 2015-8-9 20:48
就这个了。我没看到旁边的高级模式
# Configuration file

general {
你改的之间有换行，你可以试试去掉这个换行。以及试试转换编码,UTF8/UTF8无BOM/ANSI，用notepad++
